alert.note: Alert for Grand and Battlement Mesas; Southwest San Juan Mountains; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 29 at 2:05AM MST until December 29 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, moderate to heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches with localized amounts of 3 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas, West Elk and Sawatch Mountains and Southwest San Juan Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 8 AM MST this morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, from this evening through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grand and Battlement Mesas; Southwest San Juan Mountains; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
